response.message:
Welcome everyone!

Now I instead of watching what posts to close, I'll have to watch what I have to reopen, with Gnoupi on the loose!
Grats all! Now quit basking in the limelight and go moderate!

Ahh, everything makes more sense now. The flair doesn't show up in Google Reader. Maybe this is the perfect place to use George's StackImage? (http://stackapps.com/questions/847/stackimage-generating-images-of-questions-and-users)
Congrats to the new mods. May their gauntlets be clad in velvet!

Congratulations guys, and thanks for volunteering.

Jeff, are you going to make these folks moderators on meta as well?  I know meta is positively scurvy with moderators already, but I don't think you should break with tradition until the entire first page of users is filled with diamond mods. ;)
@Bill ah yes, I forgot Meta. Will do.
Nice to see that good choices have been made. Congratulations and try to keep up the good work.
